content_html: Local reports say at least 14 fire trucks were called to the fire in the residential area, resulting in an evacuation to two nearby centres.

summary: Local reports say at least 14 fire trucks were called to the fire in the residential area, resulting in an evacuation to two nearby centres.
title: Huge fire rips through residential homes in Manila
